Name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
Title: Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
Desc: Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

Talent.Name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your character uses a skill:</color> This card will accumulate 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Treasure Clue</color>.\nIf this card has stored 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Treasure Clues</color>, then discard this card and draw 3 cards.
